TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
> 
>

> 
> 
> Am I able to change my name to Trit0n? Originally my discord name was JustCosmic but I changed it to Trit0n and I was wondering if I could do the same with my forum account.
> 

I was able.

[@Vanamonde](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/27914-vanamonde/) Not quite on topic - I asked for my account to be deleted about 30hours ago but it hasn't happened yet. Can you take a look?

> 1 hour ago, Cryptobux said:
> 
> 
> [@Vanamonde](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/27914-vanamonde/) Not quite on topic - I asked for my account to be deleted about 30hours ago but it hasn't happened yet. Can you take a look?

Forum moderators do not have access to the account delete function. You'd need Private Division staff to do that, and I really couldn't say what their staffing is like at the moment. I'd give you more information if I had it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

Hmm. I'd like my personal details (email) to be removed from  this forum's database. I understand that's a legal right in certain jurisdictions, and probably in the host country of this forum. Who should I contact?
